title: Mockup Creator
overview:
This webapp is made with Vue.js and TailwindCSS and features an easy to use mockup creator.
There are many mockups to choose from like social media posts and phones or other devices.
The mockups can be exported as PNG.

content.title: Usage
content.text:
Select a mockup from the start page and start creating your mockup. Edit to your liking with the provided tools.
Afterwards you can export the mockup as a PNG file.
